message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.DM. 

The paper deals with the task of obtaining the maximum a posteriori estimate of discrete pairwise random fields, which is a common problem in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The proposed method involves solving an st-MINCUT problem, which is a common technique in computer vision (cs.CV) and graph theory (cs.DS). The paper also discusses experiments using both synthetic and real data, which suggests a focus on data mining (cs.DM).
